ygData.msgSnippet: ouch, ack, doh! i learned it back in beta 3 myself =/ may lambent quest items drop readily for you.  just hope she didn t have 2 yaks ;) Shada Powa, L50 Wood
ygData.messageBody:
ouch, ack, doh!

i learned it back in beta 3 myself =/

may lambent quest items drop readily for you. just hope she didn't have 2
yaks ;)

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L43 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> Hello everyone :)
>
> Well I just wanted to tell you a little tale so that you can
> all remember
> not to make my mistakes. Last night, I made the mistake of consenting

> Well, long
> story short, all my armor and weapons were stolen (punishment
> for twinking,
